summary: Iterates through all the values of an array.
description:
This block is dynamic thus the array type of the input data can be changed using the block configuration dialog.
The data port value type is constrained to all array value type.

dataPorts.Start Index: index where the iteration starts (by default <doc-value translate=no>0</doc-value> for the beginning of the array).
dataPorts.End Index: index where the iteration stops (by default <doc-value translate=no>undefined</doc-value> for the end of the array).
dataPorts.Index: index of the current iteration step.

controlPorts.Out: is activated when the last iteration occurred.
controlPorts.Loop Out: is activated when at least one element remains.
